name: gitrowspack-api
description: A node-api for the gitrows npm package

scripts.dev: test -f .env && nodemon index.js || echo 'Error, No .env found !'
scripts.start: test -f .env && node index.js || echo 'Error, No .env found !'
scripts.docker-build: test -f .env && docker build -t sanixdarker/gitrowspack-api:latest -f Dockerfile . || echo 'Error, No .env found !'
scripts.docker-run: test -f .env && docker run --env-file .env -it --rm -p 3030:3030 sanixdarker/gitrowspack-api:latest || echo 'Error, No .env found !'

author: sanix-darker
